name: MNIST
description: The MNIST dataset contains a large collection of handwritten digits, widely used for training image processing and machine learning algorithms.

name: CIFAR-10
description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, used for object recognition and image classification tasks.

name: IMDB Movie Reviews
description: The IMDB Movie Reviews dataset includes a collection of movie reviews labeled as positive or negative, commonly used for sentiment analysis and text classification.

name: Titanic Survival
description: The Titanic Survival dataset contains information about passengers on the Titanic, used for predicting passenger survival based on various features.
